name: Missile Busters II
overview: A collect-em-up style game. Your planet is under threat by falling missiles. Therefore it is up to you to collect those missiles into the Missile Compaction Container - again.. The only way to survive is to NOT let the contamination damage counter reach 100% otherwise your planet is doomed. There are various power ups which could be handy or useless. Left + Right arrow objects will expand your container's length, so that collecting missiles is easier. Avoid the bomb power ups, otherwise say bye bye to your home planet. :o)
